body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Currently we support header propagation for starting workflows and activities but not signals and queries. Already added in the API protos at https://github.com/temporalio/api/pull/124.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Need to implement the propagation of the header values between the signal/query calls and the events.
title: Header support for signals and queries
